sentences.en: A bill of lading may be either freight prepaid or freight payable at destination.
sentences.cn: 提单所规定的运费,可以预先支付,或在目的地支付.

sentences.en: About 14 states have licensing regulations for marketing prepaid legal services.
sentences.cn: 大约已有14个州为预付费法律服务经营制定了许可证条例.

sentences.en: Does the East West Bank Prepaid Gift Card have an expiration date?
sentences.cn: 华美银行预付礼金卡有使用期限 吗 ?

sentences.en: Freight must be prepaid before we send the delivery.
sentences.cn: 运费必须在运输之前支付.

sentences.en: Freight prepaid to Buenos aires in transit to Asuncion Paraguay.
sentences.cn: 运费付至布宜诺斯艾利斯,再转运到巴拉圭的亚松森.

sentences.en: How much does the East West Bank Prepaid Gift Card cost?
sentences.cn: 购买华美银行预付礼金卡的服务费?

sentences.en: I'd Iike a prepaid phone card The 20 - pound one, please!
sentences.cn: 我要一张电话预付卡20英镑的, 谢谢!

sentences.en: Pioneer Travel Services Ltd. - Online booking sales of tickets, prepaid hotel rates.
sentences.cn: 香港机票网 - 提供网上机票预订服务,另含机票常识 、 航班资料等.

sentences.en: Prepaid expenses are listed last among the current assets.
sentences.cn: 预提费用被列示在流动资产的最后一项.

sentences.en: Return the enclosed Donation Form today in the prepaid envelope provided.
sentences.cn: 请于今日将随函附上的捐款表格用所提供的邮资预付的信封寄回。

sentences.en: The bill of lading should be marked as " freight prepaid ".
sentences.cn: 提单上应该注明 “ 运费预付 ” 字样.

sentences.en: There is no night time discount for prepaid service.
sentences.cn: 预付费业务不享受夜间时段优惠.

sentences.en: Why would you have a prepaid phone card if you have a cell phone?
sentences.cn: 假如你有手机,为何还要用预付卡 呢 ?

sentences.en: Yes, you can cancel the East West Bank Prepaid Gift Card.
sentences.cn: 可以, 您可以取消华美银行预付礼金卡.

trans.tran_en: if something is prepaid, it is paid for before it is needed or used

trans.tran_cn: 预付，先付( prepay的过去式和过去分词 )，预付（邮资等）
